title: Happy thoughts
description: A social media site where you can post happy thoughts to other people. This site was built with React and works with an API to send and receive data.

title: Guess the Animal
description: A version of the sight Guess Who but with animals. This Project uses objects, arrays and functions on JavaScript

title: Weather app
description: An collaborative app for weather forecast. A simple weather app that changes design according to current weather.

title: Movies
description: A website that shows new movies releases and their raitings. Website build using React router to load dynamic content

title: Villa Maresme
description: A hotel website with a booking system incorporated. This site was designed with Wix and uses Wix hotel booking sytem

title: From Head to Toes
description: A website designed for a massage company. Worked on all the design process, from branding to final website

title: Beata Linz Marketing
description: Website built for email marketing expert. Website editing in SquareSpace

title: Boutique Hotel Vosje
description: A website for a Small Boutique Hotel. This website is built on wix but uses an external booking system
